mapper.select: SELECT customer_no, customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CUSTOMER WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}

SELECT * FROM (select row_number() over(order by u.customer_NO) rNum, u.order_no, u.customer_no, u.order_date, c.customer_name, c.customer_id FROM u_order u, customer c WHERE u.customer_no=#{customerNo}) WHERE rNum between #{displayPost} and #{lastNum}

SELECT * FROM (select row_number() over(order by scrap_no) rNum, s.customer_no, s.p_no, pi.stored_file_name, p.p_name, p.p_price from scrap s, p_image pi, product p WHERE s.p_no=pi.p_no and pi.p_no=p.p_no and customer_no=#{customerNo}) WHERE rNum between #{displayPost} and #{lastNum}

select pi.stored_file_name, u.order_no, ud.order_detail_number, p.p_name ,p.p_no, c.customer_No , ud.product_count, ud.product_price ,ud.order_check, ud.refund_check from P_IMAGE pi, PRODUCT p, CUSTOMER c, U_O_DETAIL ud, U_ORDER u where c.customer_no=u.customer_no and u.order_no = ud.order_no and ud.p_no=p.p_no and p.p_no=pi.p_no and ud.order_no=#{orderNo}

select pi.stored_file_name, u.order_no,c.customer_no, ud.order_detail_number, p.p_no, p.p_name , ud.product_count, ud.product_price from P_IMAGE pi, PRODUCT p, CUSTOMER c, U_O_DETAIL ud, U_ORDER u where c.customer_no=u.customer_no and u.order_no = ud.order_no and ud.p_no=p.p_no and p.p_no=pi.p_no and ud.order_detail_number=#{orderDetailNumber}
SELECT count(order_no) FROM U_ORDER WHERE customer_no=#{customerNo}
SELECT count(scrap_no) FROM scrap WHERE customer_no=#{customerNo}
